org.scec.gui
Class OvalBorder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.scec.gui.OvalBorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.border.Border
public class OvalBorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.border.Border

Title: OvalBorder
Description: This class implements a Border that has rounded edges. Gives a GUI a sofgter feel, instead of typical rectangular components

Note: <.b>This class has a few problems with aliasing for single thickness lines with small rounded corners. May need to be fixed at some point in the future. For our app we use the double thick line so not a problem

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001
Company:

Field Summary
protected  java.awt.Color bottomColor
          The color of the border in the bottom and right sides, defaults to gray
protected  int height
          Height in pixels of the rounded corners, the higher the number, the larger the rounded corner is drawn
protected  boolean thickLine
          Can draw line as either single thickness or double.
protected  java.awt.Color topColor
          The color of the border in the top and left sides, defaults to white
protected  int width
          Width in pixels of the rounded corners, the higher the number, the larger the rounded corner is drawn
